editorialNotes.tagline: Ollie and flip for high scores
editorialNotes.standard: Sure, there are skateboarding games that let you pull 900s from telephone wires, then land in a manual, collecting millions of points. But when you want realism and complexity, you want True Skate. For years, True Axis’ skateboarding simulator has been letting us ollie, grind, and kickflip with our fingers. Competing with your friends, scouting gaps, and completing missions is great fun, but the true reward is perfecting a line and nailing incredible tricks with just the right swipes.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Train up and compete in races!

editorialNotes.standard: In this gorgeous twist on the infinite runner, you guide an agile snowboarder down a never-ending mountain, pulling off backflips over icy chasms and grinding along rooftops in sleepy villages. Simple one-finger controls make it instantly accessible, but tackling each level’s trio of challenges requires deft reflexes. With its exquisitely rendered visuals, soothing music, and finely tuned gameplay, Alto’s Adventure is simultaneously serene and exciting.
editorialNotes.short: We're obsessed with nailing the perfect run while admiring the gorgeous scenery.

ios.subtitle: The ducks are ready to fight!

editorialNotes.short: Bend the rules and knock out opponents in this fun retro-style game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Could there be golf on Mars?
Fly and combat over the city

editorialNotes.standard: Don’t be fooled by the old-school arcade visuals—instead of testing your reflexes in the ring, Punch Club is a tycoon-style game about the sweet science of turning a down-and-out boxer into the next great champion. Keep your fighter fit, fed, rested, and happy as you meet zany characters, balance work and relationships, laugh at ’80s movie in-jokes, and acquire a dizzying array of fighting skills. Only the strongest—and the most strategic—will make it to the top.
Take in chill vibes as you chain-trick combos off everything from squirrels to logs in this retro-styled one-button endless skater.

OK Golf is as stress-free as a golf game gets. We love the cool, crisp lines of the striking polygonal courses, and the one-touch controls are easy to get a grip on. When we do slice one out of bounds, we just pretend we were aiming for one of the many off-course secret bonus holes.
editorialNotes.short: The joy of sinking a perfect shot without sunburns or squawking seagulls.

ios.subtitle: Fly and combat over the city
Fly and combat over the city

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: One team, one dream. But a massive number of tyre options.
